feed.title: Confidential Script: Emulate soft forks using stateless TEEs

entry.title: Confidential Script: Emulate soft forks using stateless TEEs
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around a technology or solution that is compared favorably to something Jeremy Rubin previously developed for CTV, indicating an innovation or improvement in the field. The mention of TEEs (Trusted Execution Environments) suggests the technology enhances security or trust in computational processes, possibly making it superior to Rubin's implementation. The inquiry about deployment status indicates interest in the practical application and real-world usage of this technology, suggesting its readiness or potential for implementation has caught attention. This could imply the technology's relevance and applicability in current systems or platforms, warranting further exploration or discussion regarding its deployment and operational aspects.
